Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm Noah the Smol and this is my system rearrangement I have begun development on.

 

Spoiler

In order of closest to farthest:

A. Kerbol: Main star, G-type. Nothing changed from base game.

     1. Dres: A scorched, sad little world being burned by Kerbol. This world is close enough to Kerbol you'll need lots of radiators!

     Ecc: 0.08 Inc: 23 deg

            1a. Pol: A small-ish burnt moon that looks like a chunk of pollen floating around Dres.

             Ecc: 0.12 Inc: 52 deg

     2. Jool: A very warm gas giant. Has 3 moons.

     Ecc: 0.03 Inc: 1.2 deg

             2a. Mun: A grey, cratered moon orbiting just out of the Roche limit of Jool.

             Ecc: 0.01 Inc: 1.3 deg

              2b. Minmus: A minty little moon orbiting on an eccentric inclined orbit.

              Ecc: 0.43 Inc: 67 deg

               2c. Bop: A little asteroid moon, far out from Jool.

               Ecc: 0.06 Inc: 8 deg

     3. Kerbin: The only inhabited world in Kerbol's system. Home to the weird ol' Kerbals.

      Ecc: 0.09 Inc: 10 deg

               3a. Laythe: The only other world with liquid water, Laythe is Kerbin's also-habitable moon which could support life. It orbits close to Kerbin.

               Ecc: 0.08 Inc: 3 deg

     4. Eeloo: Cool-ish icy world with a possible underground ocean.

     Ecc: 0.3 Inc: 19 deg

               4a. Gilly: Small asteroid moon covered in dust and lumps.

               Ecc: 0.03 Inc: 12 deg

      5. Tylo: Large Munlike with no atmosphere,  hard to land on.

       Ecc: 0.07 Inc: 27 deg

                5a. Ike: Large, darker moon covered in craters.

                Ecc: 0.02 Inc: 12 deg

                 5b. Duna: Far-out atmospheric moon with lots of red.

                 Ecc: 0.07 Inc: 14 deg

      6. Eve: Purpley cold planet with atmosphere.

       Ecc: 0.14 Inc: 37 deg

                  6a. Vall: Caldera-ish moon covered in teal.

                   Ecc: 0.28 Inc: 76 deg

B. Bill's Star(name inspired from @electricpants's Val's Star): Small K type star orbiting Kerbol ~3x Eve's orbit. Has planets of its own.

These are bound to change!

This is literally my '0.2' of the mod.

Edit Log

Spoiler

6/3/2019- v. 0.2- Added Bill's Star and fixed a bit of formatting.

 

Edited June 3, 2019 by Noah the Smol
Edited everything, rearranged a bit.

8 minutes ago, bobjonesisthebest:D said:

this looks cool

Thanks!
i can help with some of the .cfg files if you want since it shouldn't be super hard

10 hours ago, electricpants said:

i can help with some of the .cfg files if you want since it shouldn't be super hard

Oh, I'd just need a general 'how-to'. Thanks tho!

This looks pretty sweet but in my opinion, Laythe becoming Kerbins moon sounds a bit funny to me unless it's some sort of double planet thing. I'm not sure why, but it just doesn't feel right. Nor does having an atmospheric desert planet as a moon to a giant rock without an atmosphere. Tylo should be the one with an atmosphere, given that it's mass is greater  and therefore has more gravity. Now I'm not some astrophysicist but I'm just sharing my opinion.

On 5/9/2019 at 10:39 AM, Noah the Smol said:

Oh, I'd just need a general 'how-to'. Thanks tho!

oh, well in that case just make sure that when you're editing something the planet/moon/star/whatever already has, put the @ symbol in front of it with no spaces.

besides that, it's really like making any other planet in kopernicus, really. just simpler since you don't have to do as much.

Edited May 11, 2019 by electricpants
